azurerm_security_center_workspace.description: Manages the subscription's Security Center Workspace.

scope.description: The scope of VMs to send their security data to the desired workspace, unless overridden by a setting with more specific scope.

workspace_id.description: The ID of the Log Analytics Workspace to save the data in.

create.description: Used when creating the Security Center Workspace.

update.description: Used when updating the Security Center Workspace.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Security Center Workspace.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Security Center Workspace.
